sourcesContent:
<template>
    <PokeDetail :pokemon="pokemon.value" v-if="pokemon"></PokeDetail> 
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue'
import { useStore } from 'vuex'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'
import PokeDetail from '../components/PokeDetail.vue'

const route = useRoute()
const store = useStore()
const pokemon = ref(async () => {  return await store.dispatch('createPokemon', route.params.id)})

console.log(pokemon.value)

// const pokemon = computed(async () => {  return await store.dispatch('createPokemon', route.params.id)})

</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
